everyone was sitting around and watching
it was not quite a hit show
people began to leave the show
output.sentences: I remember sitting in a room full of my peers.
I heard a soft tune and noticed that music had started playing and there was a pianist playing in the corner of the room.
I continued sitting and watching the man play as his music was soothing.
I heard commotion in the background and spun around to see that a decoration had fallen and hit a guest causing them to wince in pain.
The music stopped as everyone's attention fell on the poor victim and people began to leave the event.
